attributes.action: Bring back british nationals stranded abroad during the pandemic
attributes.additional_details: There are many key NHS workers that are currently trapped abroad. These workers will be crucial to fighting the Covid 19 outbreak. On top of this there are vulnerable British citizens trapped in countries that do not have the same resources and medical knowledge that is available back in Britain. This could lead to a number of fatalities of UK residents and potentially our important and skilled key workers, overseas that do not need to happen.
attributes.background: Bring back all British citizens that are currently stranded in foreign countries. With priorities being the important NHS staff and our vulnerable people. This will allow us to better combat the Virus and prevent any unnecessary fatalities.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307260

Since you started your petition the Government has announced a new government partnership with airlines to fly back more tourists stranded abroad: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-government-partnership-with-airlines-to-fly-back-more-tourists-stranded-abroad

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
